name: Brooke Watford
text: All I asked was from the brackets of my bumper to be cut and welded lower to accommodate the for gap from a body lift. The first pic is what I asked for versus what I received. They scratched up the paint on my truck and scratched my headlights. They made the bumper flush with the bottom of the hood after being fully aware of the hood being popped. I was told that it took 3 hours to do this hack job.  I was also told that if I wanted better results that I should've done it myself since I've already done all the other work on the truck.

resp.text: Work was performed EXACTLY as the customer requested.  She was unhappy with the outcome because parts she provided us were not fabricated properly.  We offered to work on it more to make her happy and she declined.

name: Rincon Parcell
text: I ordered some half doors for my 88 wrangler from these guys. I tell you what the quality of the doors were great. Their customer service reps were awesome, talked to them two times. Shipping was a little slow but understandable, they had to build them to order. I'd order more from them. The doors did not come with rails to attach soft top door seems only the holes for uprights. But hey I had some rails laying around. Anyway, I'll do business with these guys again. Great stuff!!

name: Sarah Kirsch
text: Matt Walton is a man among men. He has great attention to detail and he is always brainstorming about the next accessory he can fabricate. Other area businesses in thes Jeep part field pale in comparison. Shop here! You won’t be disappointed.

name: Travis Reid
text: UCF is a top of the line place to get parts or work done! Very knowledgeable, great pricing and fantastic customer service. Everything I've gotten from UCF have been top notch, no issues and fit perfectly.  I always spread the word to people who are looking at modding their Jeep. Thanks Matt!

name: Derrick Bracewell
text: Matt’s easy to work with.   If something does go wrong he will make it right.   Great business.

name: Gene Wright
text: Everyone is an internet “expert” in the Jeep / off-roading / fabrication world. Mat at Undercover Fab Works is the real deal. His Knowledge, skill and real life experience is what separates UCF from the “experts” and other shops. If your wanting to upgrade that  Jeep /rig or repair something that broke while  wheeling do yourself a favor and Call UCF you will not be disappointed.  Photos are before and after of UCF  Custom Fabricated front hoop with Stinger.

resp.text: Thanks for being a great customer.  Looking forward to seeing you in another Jeep very soon.

name: Haley Bracewell
text: Professional, friendly, and exceptional service! I will continue to do business with UCF.

name: Bonnie Brock (GDZJEEP)
text: Absolute top notch products and top notch people.  We've purchased several products over the years and have NEVER been disappointed.  Honest people to do business with.  I highly recommend.  If I could give more than 5 stars, I would.

name: James Hill
text: UCF is second to none. They are incredibly knowledgeable, do excellent work, and ship their top notch high quality parts lightning fast.  From mild to wild, this shop is the go to place for any off road rig, and more!

resp.text: Thanks for being a great customer!

name: Dustin Monday
text: Great shop and great customer service. The team at UCF always goes above and beyond for any of their customers needs. Give these guys a call for any of fabrication needs!

name: Jonathan Allen
text: I've been buying parts from Matt for 6 or 8 years now and I've loved everything I've ever gotten. They have the best skids on the market, no questions asked, and all of their other stuff is top notch too. If you're planning to do a tummy tuck, suspension work, or you need a cage, UCF really should be where you go. My TJ wouldn't be half as capable as it is without Matt's parts and service.

resp.text: Thanks for being a great customer!

name: Greg Dalley
text: Matthew and the crew at Under Cover Fab Have been my go to shop on my two jeeps for  years ,always charges fair prices and does excellent work. I highly recommend them for all your fabrication needs.

name: Blake Sanders
text: Have had great experience with UCF!! Very affordable and nice! Will continue to gain my business

name: Russell Murray
text:
Well designed off road parts with fair prices and knowledgeable staff.
Very good selection of parts and accessories.

name: Robert Farmer
text: Great customer service. Called after hours and Matt answered while he was on a wheeling trip. I have ordered a lot of parts and shipping has always been fast.

name: Greg Byrd
text: This is the best place for vehicle customization. Great customer service and they stand behind their work.

name: Thomas Starling
text: Great and friendly staff that are always there to help the customers no matter where they are at be it at the shop or half way between a Rock and hard space.

resp.text: Thanks for being a great customer!

name: Srdjan Bunjevac
text: Worst experience ever. I placed orders in the past and things were always great. Good communication and always fast and secure shipping with a signature on delivery. Ordered a front TJ bumper ( second one for wife’s Jeep ) and it was dropped off on the front porch by UPS while we were away and went missing. Upon contacting Undercover Fab they told me it’s standard practice to drop off expensive items on the porch. Upon getting UPS to file a claim they said it would have to be done by the shipper. Undercover fab had the worst communication ever. I left dozen voicemails and sent numerous emails without any response. UPS needed them to complete couple of forms and for UPS to reimburse me. I am out the products cost of shipping and duties to Canada. Due to no communication I called another company.  Upon explaining my situation they overnighted me a bumper with insurance and signature required upon delivery. Can’t say anything bad about their products cause they are top notch but service is horrible. Very disappointed.

resp.text: Customer never requested signature on delivery.  Delivered on time.  Customer said it never delivered even though UPS confirmed it was.  Tried to send customer a replacement and it was declined.  While waiting on a claim from UPS customer left this review.

name: Thomas Starling
text: Great and friendly staff that are always there to help the customers no matter where they are at be it at the shop or half way between a Rock and hard space.

resp.text: Thanks for being a great customer!

name: Kevin Atkins
text: Top notch shop for any off-road work, fab and Jeep parts

text: Months late for shipment, Missing parts, Terrible customer service - does not respond or make good for mistakes or problems. Stay away

resp.text: Products were damaged by freight shipping company.  Refund was given and customer was made whole.

He will lie and call the police on you. Some of the workers don't even like him. Yet he still there... Car tech is looking for a lawsuit.

name: Michelle Youngblood
text:
I worked here at Car Tech an had to take some time off because of my husband being in bad health. It's a good company to work for but the only down side is you never know when you're going to get off of work. I enjoyed the work an the people I worked with.

I got another Quality Control Job closer to where I live an enjoy the people I work with. I just wanted to say Thank You to Car Tech for having me and I will miss all of y'all. I didn't want to write a bad review.

name: PS PS
text: Dropped off a coil very quick security guard was extremely kind and professional. Keep up the good work it really makes a difference

text: Always fast to load and unload. Really nice staff

name: Latonya Moore
text: A family member works here. That family members vehicle is inoperable. I would take said family member to this 0lace for work. My car broke down. Keep in mind I don't work for this company, my family member does. These a$$holes are demanding proof that my car was broke down. As I see it, if you're not going to help pay for repairs, you have no right to demand proff of repairs for someone who doesn't work for you. Point, blank and period!!!!!!! This seems to be illegal. I will report this to the BBB and any other departments I feel should look into this practice. Call me whiny are whatever, this isn't right to ask for proof of receipt and then to look under my hood. I refuse. FOH.

name: Jerome Taylor
text: I got here the night before appt. Was able to pull around back of building to rest. Forklift driver told me which door to back into at 0400 because he said it would get real busy come morning. The morning crew was curios as to why I didn't get unloaded the night before. I expect confusion just starting a new account, no problem they unloaded me right away. Parking, and docking are tight due to employees parking illegally.

name: Tom Solley
text: Our Chrysler Marine starter quit working. Started to spend $300 for a rebuilt one off eBay, but thought I'd give them a try. Two days later and $58, she's as good as new. Couldn't be happier, will use them again for sure.

name: Wes Bryant
text: Stopped by Brown-Keahey on the recommendation of a friend.  Had a question about my starter.  They were closed (Saturday) but Donnie happened to be there.  He took time on his day off to answer questions about my starter and showed me some side projects he was working on.  Much appreciated!

name: Roger Prine
text: The place to go for rebuilding your alternators are starters for that you can't find in the store
